metadata.title: Tuesday, 9th October, 2012
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs when the Government will build residential houses for Prison Officers in Luanshya District.

parts: (a)    what has caused the delay in rehabilitating the Nsama-Nkosha road in Kaputa District when funds were allocated to the Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit (DMMU) for the project;
(b)    how much money was released to the DMMU in 2011 and 2012 for the project; and
(c)    whether the rehabilitation works will be completed before the onset of the rains in 2012.
(a)    when a District Agricultural Coordinator (DACO) will be posted to Mulobezi District;
(b)    when the Government will construct an office block for the DACO in the District; and
(c)    what the estimated cost and time-frame for completion of the project are.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what the total cost of constructing the Chipata-Mchinji Railway Line was;
(b)    how much cargo, in metric tonnes, and passengers were transported on the Railway Line from the time it was commissioned in August, 2010 to July, 2012; and
(c)    whether the Government is satisfied with the operations of the Railway Line and, if not, why.
(a)    how much revenue was collected by the Zambia Revenue Authority at Nakonde Border Post from 2009 to 2011, year by year; and
(b)    what the immediate direct and indirect benefits of the collections to Nakonde District are.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    what the total number of lecturers at Kabwe Institute of Technology was as of August, 2012, compared to its staff establishment;
(b)    what measures the Government has taken to attract more lecturers to the Institute; and
(c)    to which authority the Institute is answerable at the district and provincial levels.

questions.minister: Minister of Lands, Natural Resources and Environmental Protection
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to degazzette the Chondwe-Kansamfu Forest in Kafulafuta Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    if so, when the Forest will be degazetted.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the roofs which were blown off during the 2011/2012 rainy season at the following schools will be repaired
parts: (a)    Liyuwayuwa;
(b)    Lyamaya; and
(c)    Mwanambao.
(a)    what type of assistance the Government renders to community radio stations for their sustainance; and
(b)    what impact, if any, have the radio stations created on their communities since their inception in Zambia.

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    what caused the delay in commencing the construction of the railway line from Chingola to Angola via Mwinilunga; and

(b)    what measures the Government has taken to ensure that the contractor commences work on the railway line without any further delay. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (25th September) - Resumption of Debate - (Mr Chisala).
